emailForm.label: Email
emailForm.invalidText: Please enter a valid email address.

errorPage.404Message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
errorPage.otherErrorMessage: Something went wrong while loading this page.

cookieConsent.title: We value your privacy
cookieConsent.text1: We use cookies to improve your experience, allowing you to remember your preferences, and for analytics, so we can make improvements based on your usage. By clicking "Accept all", you consent to the use of all cookies.

requiredCookies.title: Required cookies
requiredCookies.description: Cookies that are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off.

preferenceCookies.title: Preference cookies
preferenceCookies.description: Cookies that are used to remember your preferences, allowing you to decide weather or not to reuse information from your previous visits so that you don't have to re-enter them.

analyticsCookies.title: Analytics cookies
analyticsCookies.description: Cookies that are used to collect analytics data. These are anonymized and are used to track how visitors use the website, so we can make improvements based on your usage.
